name: proxy-accounting-system
description: 代理记账营运内部系统

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.test: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend && echo '✅ 所有测试通过'
scripts.test:ci: pnpm run test:backend --reporter=json && pnpm run test:frontend --reporter=json
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter frontend lint:fix && pnpm --filter backend lint:fix
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm --filter backend setup && pnpm --filter frontend setup
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
